step.cmd: Follow the steps to recover your account. You'll be asked some questions to confirm that it's your account, and an email will be sent to you. If you don't get an email:

ul.li: Check your Spam or Bulk Mail folders.
Add noreply@google.com to your address book.

li.xref: To request another email, follow the steps to recover your account

ul.li: Check all email addresses that you might have used to sign up for or sign in to your account.

step.cmd: Choose a password that you haven't already used with this account. Learn how to create a long password.
